headline: McDonald’s Shares Slump as GLP-1 Risks Spur Rare Sell Rating
summary: (Bloomberg) -- McDonald’s Corp. shares slumped on Tuesday after Redburn Atlantic slapped the burger chain with its sole sell rating, saying shifting consumer patterns due to weight-loss drugs and inflation are cause for concern.Most Read from BloombergTrump Said He Fired the National Portrait Gallery Director.
